Demo.Description: This demo is designed to show how developers can quickly get started with Windows Azure Web Sites and even run classic ASP pages. This demo involves creating a Windows Azure Web Site in the management portal, creating a hello world classic ASP page, and deploying the page using FTP. This is a good demo to show as a second or third web site demo when presenting to enterprise customers or corporate developers that may have older ASP applications that are maintaining.
Demo.Title: Hello ASP in Windows Azure Web Sites
